unnormalised: Just a heads up for first-time homebuyers, property registration charges in Maharashtra are usually around 5% of the agreement value or the market value, whichever is higher, plus ₹30,000 for properties costing above ₹30 lakh. Also, be sure to check the carpet area – builders sometimes quote the super built-up area which can be 20% to 30% more.
normalised: Just a heads up for first-time home buyers, property registration charges in Maharashtra are usually around five percent of the agreement value or the market value, whichever is higher, plus rupee thirty thousand for properties costing above rupee thirty lakh. Also, be sure to check the carpet area – builders sometimes quote the super built-up area which can be twenty percent to thirty percent more.
